name: parentage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
When you refer to people's parentage, you mean their parents and/or their parent's country and social class: The novel starts when a child of unknown parentage is left at the house of the local priest. She is of mixed Australian and Japanese parentage. Compare
parenthood
